meanings.sent1: Her uncalloused hands felt smooth and soft.
meanings.sent2: The baby's uncalloused feet were delicate and tender.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his uncalloused palms were too delicate for manual labor.
meanings.sent4: In a world of calloused hearts, her uncalloused empathy stood out.
meanings.sent5: The uncalloused skin on her fingertips made playing the guitar a challenge.

meanings.definition: Lacking hardened or thickened areas of skin
meanings.sent1: The uncalloused heels of the dancer glided gracefully across the floor.
meanings.sent2: His uncalloused elbows showed that he was not used to physical work.
meanings.sent3: The uncalloused knees of the marathon runner surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: In a crowd of uncalloused palms, his stood out as a testament to hard work.
meanings.sent5: The uncalloused soles of her feet felt every pebble on the path.

meanings.definition: Without rough or toughened patches of skin
meanings.sent1: Her uncalloused fingertips traced delicate patterns in the sand.
meanings.sent2: The uncalloused skin on his face showed his youthfulness.
meanings.sent3: The uncalloused palms of the pianist danced effortlessly on the keys.
meanings.sent4: In a world of uncalloused hands, his grip was surprisingly strong.
meanings.sent5: The uncalloused soles of his feet felt the cool grass beneath them.
